title: Russia using Interpol's wanted list to target critics abroad, leak reveals
generated_title: Thousands of files provided by a whistleblower at Interpol expose the extent of Russia's apparent abuse of the international policing agency. Russia is using Interpol's wanted lists to request the arrest of people such as political opponents, businessmen and journalists.

title: People cling to treetops as 'worst floods in a generation' sweep Mozambique
